column1: These girls are our future leaders and yesterday’s event was a great reminder that when women empower women we’re better for it.

Seeing a woman run and win inspired her to run for 4th grade class president. And I can’t tell you how much it means to me to have young girls running for their class office because they see so many women leading in their government.

This type of representation really does matter. I told a story about Addie the daughter of one of our great volunteers. Addie came with her mom to events and to knock on doors and had the chance to watch our team go from a start up campaign to actually governing in Washington.

Yesterday I was proud to speak in Lansing for the fourth annual Women’s March. In 2018 women played an outsized role in flipping our district and we elected a female Governor female Secretary of State and female Attorney General. https://t.co/w7BXr5G58X

We have SIX upcoming events across the district where we’ll hit the streets and talk to voters about what our campaign is all about. No experience necessary!   Rochester: https://t.co/tMsVKCk7kj East Lansing: https://t.co/Agoc7NqOjd Brighton: https://t.co/P7w9kdMH5E
Merry Christmas Happy Hanukkah and a joyous holiday season to you and yours! https://t.co/pe1gQSNpXK

With super PACs spending over $1 million on ads against me and the Trump family tweeting about us I'd deeply appreciate your help to make sure we end the year strong. Can you make a contribution to make sure we're ready to fight in 2020? https://t.co/Wtcd659K4W
There are some decisions in life that have to be made based on what you know in your bones is right. And this is one of those times. https://t.co/1FN17ZnABw

Fun night talking 2020 strategy at our winter field kickoff in Rochester Hills. It was great to see friends from the last campaign and plenty of new faces too. We won’t be able to do this without you all so thank you for coming! https://t.co/rgpD9SVLTo

Want to be a part of the campaign? We need to collect 2000 signatures by April 21 to make sure I’m back on the ballot. This is a fun and easy way to get involved in the community! To participate in a winter field training - sign up here: https://t.co/cbcTp1lrXt

It took us an extra day to get all 21 of us to Florida but we're finally sitting down to dinner with the Moore side of the family.  To all of you who have supported our campaign in so many ways we're so thankful!   From our family to yours Happy Thanksgiving! https://t.co/S2QhFAfiKP

Was glad to sit down with @camanpour to discuss why working by with and through coalition partners matters & why it helps protect American lives.  Global threats require a global response. That’s why I introduced a resolution to affirm our support for the counter-ISIS coalition: https://t.co/esebGI8jux
28 degrees and sunny turned out to be great game day weather - even if the game was a bit messy. MSU won the first quarter though! As always GO GREEN!🏈 https://t.co/mbAinEEe25

Not cool @nbcsnl. Leaving the U.P. off a map is like calling pop “soda” or driving a car on Mackinac. Or eating pizza without ranch. It’s just plain wrong.  The fine people of our Upper Peninsula have long been neglected by lazy cartography—and I think you owe them an apology. https://t.co/1MKWL2UWlj

I’m proud to serve alongside @JoeCunninghamSC. The @NRCC’s attack on his family is a new low in our politics –– and exactly why we need leaders like Joe who model the civility and integrity we need now more than ever in Washington. I hope you’ll support him: https://t.co/5kuxByFBoo

Couldn’t be more proud to serve alongside these women –– especially this week.  We came to Congress shaped by our backgrounds in national security with a clear mandate from our constituents –– to work across the aisle to get things done and to always put country over party. https://t.co/Sr5kp40VKi

I swore an oath to protect and defend the Constitution. If true these new allegations against the President are a threat to our national security and constitute an impeachable offense. https://t.co/oCkAuT94O7

I'm ready to pass smart and effective means to secure our border. But the Administration's decision to divert money from our military to fulfill a campaign promise politicizes the Pentagon –– which is harmful to our service members and the future of our military. https://t.co/dXZNwsWgXP

This #LaborDay we take time to acknowledge the work of the labor movement and America’s working people.   I spent the morning marching with @OE_324 in downtown Detroit — who operate a world-class equipment training facility in #MI08. It was a privilege to march along side them. https://t.co/r1LqxUrNGg
Michigan is a must-win state. But to do well here candidates need to get serious about responding to the issues we’re facing in our state: https://t.co/Ci5XS51s3P #DemDebate
Hey @vancityReynolds check out the shirt I got from *the real* Zukey Lake Tavern in Pinckney. If you ever want to visit the Great Lakes State I can show you around! https://t.co/gPEGULMZrV

Had a great time marching with supporters in Clarkston’s 4th of July parade this morning. Happy Independence Day to all!   Now onto my other favorite holiday traditions: jumping in the pool and eating hot dogs! 🌭🇺🇸 https://t.co/oGTmAjE5Iy

Today is the last day of #Pride. Proud to stand alongside the LGBTQ community to celebrate how far we have come and recognize how much more there is to do –– this month and every month. https://t.co/vBpWAoVMSu
Check out this amazing woman running for Congress! As an Army veteran guidance counselor and councilwoman @VoteJackie4NY knows what it means to dedicate her life to service: https://t.co/pk2c32XVZF

We have evolved as a nation to agree that no one should go broke because they happen to get sick or have a pre-existing condition.  Great to join @Morning_Joe to talk about what we're doing to lower prescription drug & healthcare costs including the bill we’re voting on today: https://t.co/krERfB9JmW

We need more leaders in Congress like my friend and former Pentagon colleague @Conole4Congress –– those who put country before party and people before politics. Encourage you to check out his campaign and get involved: https://t.co/T5d9yv352D

It's Election Day for many counties and municipalities across our state! Click here to find out if your community is among them: https://t.co/eSaaEl7UW7  Remember: if you're not registered you can still register today. Polls are open until 8PM! https://t.co/huZ6smAmP4

Proud of my friend Pentagon colleague and Navy veteran @Conole4Congress for jumping in the race. If you like supporting service candidates please check him out.  Fantastic person who will do great things for his home town. https://t.co/jjYIZFlzzH
So sorry to our Spartans. You played your hearts out and you made us proud. You gave a lot of people a lot of joy these last few weeks 💚 #FinalFour
Mood for tonight’s game. #GoGreen #FinalFour https://t.co/MFGTboJ4R5
Wishing I were back in Michigan for #OpeningDay! Hope everyone had a great time and can't wait to be back at Comerica Park. https://t.co/HGIfkwiMoq
I owe you some MSU gear this week @JoeCunninghamSC! https://t.co/MFALmO8ZsJ
C’mon @NateSilver538 show your home town some love! You gave MSU less than a 50% chance of beating Duke –– time to re-think the model! #GoGreen #GoWhite https://t.co/DuAsbbSujE
#FINALFOUR BABY! #GoGreen #GoWhite
Watching the last minutes of the @MSU_Basketball game like... https://t.co/7ZexPh3qDy

Last night I went on @RealTimers to talk about the issues we're focused on here in the Midwest: the cost of healthcare & prescription drugs protecting people with pre-existing conditions –– and how to approach these issues pragmatically.  Watch more here: https://t.co/wHyORYDL5R https://t.co/zIoF5JQpGK
Couldn’t be more proud: MSU is on to the Elite Eight! Congrats @MSU_Basketball! https://t.co/oygW4ZepIE

You’re right @mariastuart –– I do like spending quality time in Livingston County! We’re just getting started so be sure to let us know when you have a community event or meeting that I or my staff can join. https://t.co/2DKcEMkI2b
Here’s my bracket for #MarchMadness. Spoiler: I’ve got #SpartanDawgs going all the way. @MSU_Basketball https://t.co/f3IrpIR37U

Great to be out in Pinckney today for their St. Patrick’s Day Parade  — surrounded by elaborate costumes creative floats an honor guard a full Scottish pipe band and even a local roller derby team. Happy #StPatricksDay everyone! 🍀 https://t.co/0rAITnfHBK

To quote my fellow House Armed Services Committee member @HoulahanForPa we’re about country not party. I’m proud to be working on the committee alongside so many new members with service and military backgrounds from both sides of the aisle. https://t.co/2BjqVCKObP
It is possible to recognize good work — and common ground — while staunchly supporting Democratic candidates around the country.

Criticizing VP @JoeBiden for complimenting Rep. Fred Upton feels like a product of our polarized times. We should recognize someone when they do something good — especially when it is supporting funding for cancer research which should transcend party politics. https://t.co/4qykljUJhZ
